title: Validate New Methods Executor
description: Validates that newly added methods don't exceed a maximum line count. Only runs in affected mode (when NX_BASE is set).

limit.description: Maximum lines allowed for new methods

mode.description: OFF: skip validation. NEW_METHODS: only new methods in diff. NEW_AND_MODIFIED_METHODS: new methods + methods with changes. MODIFIED_FILES: all methods in modified files.

disableAllowed.description: Whether disable comments work. When false, no escape hatch.
